name: Oculon.AI
experience: Developed responsive and interactive user interfaces using ReactJS, ensuring accessibility and enhancing the overall user experience.
Built a customizable settings panel, enabling users to personalize product features and improve engagement through tailored UI/UX.
Designed and developed a comprehensive dashboard with custom plugins for charts, metrics, and dynamic tables, delivering advanced data visualization capabilities.
Integrated RESTful APIs to enable seamless data flow between frontend and backend components, ensuring smooth functionality and real-time interaction.
Collaborated with backend teams to design and implement APIs, ensuring synchronization and efficient data handling across the platform.
Authored clean, modular, and scalable frontend code, improving application performance and maintainability.
Enhanced platform usability by creating intuitive, user-centric designs and interactive UI components, reducing user-reported issues by 15%.
Optimized frontend performance, reducing load times and ensuring smooth rendering across devices and browsers.
Implemented modern frontend development practices, including state management and reusable component architecture, to accelerate feature delivery.
